name: INMediaAffinityType
desc: Constants that describe a user’s affinity for a media item.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: A type that indicates the user’s affinity for the media item is unknown.

items.name: case like
items.desc: A type that indicates the user likes the media item.

items.name: case dislike
items.desc: A type that indicates the user dislikes the media item.
